steps.title: Drawing lightly, make guidelines to help visualize the length, bend and the handle of the sword.
steps.content: Drawing lightly, make guidelines to help visualize the length, bend and the handle of the sword.

steps.title: Make a rough sketch of the sword's shape, handle and the guard (if any).
steps.content: Make a rough sketch of the sword's shape, handle and the guard (if any).

steps.title: Create finer details using a sharper tipped pencil or sketching tool.
steps.content: Create finer details using a sharper tipped pencil or sketching tool.

steps.title: Draw the final outline over the sketch.
steps.content: Draw the final outline over the sketch.

steps.title: Erase and remove the sketch marks to produce a clean outlined drawing.
steps.content: Erase and remove the sketch marks to produce a clean outlined drawing.

steps.title: Add color or shading to the drawing if needed.
steps.content: Add color or shading to the drawing if needed.

steps.title: Drawing lightly, sketch the shape of the sword you have in mind.
steps.content: Drawing lightly, sketch the shape of the sword you have in mind.

steps.title: Sketch additional details for the blade handle and guard (if any)
steps.content: Sketch additional details for the blade handle and guard (if any)
